ygData.subject: Fracturcon's Plot
ygData.msgSnippet: As a CR chamber finishes it s cycle, the Maximal inside emerges from the chamber, fully repaired & fully functional.  Fracturcon quickly does a self diagnostic

Subject: Fracturcon's Plot
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=US-ASCII
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable
Content-Disposition: inline
From: "Michael Stadnik" <mstadnik@...>

As a CR chamber finishes it's cycle, the Maximal inside emerges from the ch=
amber, fully repaired & fully functional.  Fracturcon quickly does a self d=
iagnostic to insure his CR chamber has completely repaired him.  The diagno=
stic computer soon says, "Operating at 100% efficency."  As soon as Fractur=
con hears the results he makes his way to his main computer.
Fracturcon:"Ca=
lculate distances from all Predicon, Maximal, & Alliance bases.  Also give =
me a run down of all human tribes scattered across the planet."

As the com=
puter begins it's scans and calculations, Fracturcon walks over to a contai=
ner with a Skull & Crossbone insignia on it.  As Fracturcon gazes upon the =
insignia a grim, yet sad, expression comes over his face.

Fracturcon: "If =
the computer calculations are what I think they are, I may have no choice b=
ut to take the ultimate step in preserving our history, even if it means de=
storying part of this planet.  All might not be lost, if I can recruit some=
 bots from each faction, I may be able to eliminate Earth's intruders witho=
ut resorting to the doomsday weapon.

As Fracturcon stares at the container=
 the computer blips & then says, "Calculations complete.  All faction bases=
 are within target area.  Human loses are within acceptable parameters & wi=
ll not result in alteration of current timeline."

Fracturcon grins & think=
s to himself, "Game set & match you Transforming scum.  I hold the final ke=
y to Earth's victory."

Fracturcon:"Computer, locate transformer Dinobot & =
send message Code Red.  Message is to read: Dinobot I know of your heroic d=
eeds when you fought alongside Optimus Primal & the Maximals during the fir=
st Beast Wars.  I also know the ultimate price you were willing to pay to p=
erserve Earth's history & it's human inhabitants.  I am here to make sure t=
he timeline is not corrupted by the current factions of Maximal & Predicons=
.  I have weapon in my possession that will insure all Transformers, includ=
ing myself, will not make it off this planet alive.  I am prepared to use t=
his weapon to insure that the timeline will not be altered by the current B=
East War taking place on this planet.  I would rather find a  more acceptab=
le solution to the problem though.  I respect and admire your code of honor=
 for which you live by & request your help in putting a more peaceful end t=
o the BEast Wars.  Please meet me at this location which I have transmitted=
 along with this message."

And with that the message ends and the corrodin=
ates for Fracturcon's base is transmitted to Dinobot.

Fracturcon walks to =
the entrance & waits.  He waits & hopes that the Beast Wars greatest warrio=
r will come & aid him in stopping the war.  If not he knows the only other =
option he has is to destory what he vowed he would never destroy again.
